Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could greatly enhance your daily productivity and satisfaction. Given its high quality and unique features, I'm confident it will be a valuable addition to your life. I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you with an offer of $180. This price reflects not only the product's intrinsic value but also the opportunity to experience its benefits before others. Please let me know if you're interested in exploring this further. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $180. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $180
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
